doc.title: Loeki de leeuw
doc.plot: Loeki "the lion" is not an actual show, but an animated puppet, which appears in one or more ultra-short sketches, often even without any text or just an exclamation, rather like a one-line newspaper cartoon, in between the individual commercials which are aired as a publicity block between (not interrupting) two regular programs on Dutch public broadcasting. There are no complex or recurring story-lines, the aim is one immediate smile or laugh.
